posts.text:
💥New: As #climate disasters intensify, the #Trump admin isn't just denying science, it is actively censoring it.

@pallavis.bsky.social unpacks how efforts to erase climate data in the US undermine scientific institutions, threaten global climate preparedness & deepen inequalities in a warming world

posts.text:
LSE Impact Blog. The #Trump administration is aggressively rolling back #climate action: erasing data, slashing #research funding, and scrubbing “climate change” from federal websites.

Pallavi Sethi ( @pallavis.bsky.social @granthamlse.bsky.social) maps the rollback timeline.

posts.text: Trump's tantrum over "rigged" jobs data reeks of selective skepticism, ignoring Wall Street's faith and economists' endorsements, even as revisions expose his tariff-tainted slowdown. #Economy
